name: DTSmart
0:
”Alexa, ask d. t. smart”
”Alexa, start d. t. smart and turn on the room”
”Alexa, start d. t. smart and turn off the room”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. t. smart
des:
DT Smart, a skill. It can control dtston's device, light with wireless WiFi. To use your Amazon Echo with your DT Smart, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your DT Smart, and activate the DT Smart Skill. This will require your DTSTON app account username and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your DTSTON account.
When using the skill. you need to specify by name which device to use. You can set the devices's name in DTSTON app which controls your devices. You can find the exact DTSTON app name in your product user manual.

Your DT Smart now talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa. You can control your DT Smart with simple statements like:

Alexa, Turn on the room
Alexa, Turn off the room
Alexa, Set room to blue
Alexa, Turn on/off the <device' name>

Remarks: When you say Alexa to wake up Alexa and say DT Smart to enter skill, you will enter the session mode, you don't have to wake up Alexa and get into this skill.

For example: Alexa, d. t. smart, turn on the room, turn off the room, bye.

If you have any questions, please visit DTSTON website or email ayzen@dtston.com for further assistance.
